ComicInfo.Summary: Katchoo sneaks onto the Parker estate and spies on Darcy and David. She overhears that David loves her and wants to be with her. When this enrages Darcy David asks her to leave Katchoo be if he promises to never see her again, but Darcy is in no mood for her younger brother. Tambi spots her and lays her out cold. Taking her into a room the two discuss the situation Francine goes to see Chuck to comfort him and maybe learn a bit more about when Rachael was there. She finds a rather irrational chuck and a grumpy Freddie keeping him company. Freddie tries poorly to seduce Francine who calls his bluff and Freddie fails her once again. Chuck confirms Rachael has the Parker tattoo and lets slip about the bikini and pictures he gave to Freddie to give back to her. She punches Chuck in the nose for being an idiot and threatens Freddie if he doesn't return them right away. Tambi interrogates her about her motives for leaving the Parker girls and he reason for being there now before taking her to the 43rd floor balcony and throwing her off it utterly dispassionately.
ComicInfo.Title: I Believe You
